definition: cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: And I'm not climbing at Longdong, either.
sentences.chinese: 而且我也不要去龙洞攀岩。

sentences.english: In the aspect of practice, a particular analysis on Longdong Gou watershed in Mao County is given.
sentences.chinese: 在实践方面，论文以茂县龙洞沟为例，进行具体分析。

sentences.english: Black Dragon Cave is a flat cave.
sentences.chinese: 黑龙洞是一平卧式洞穴。

sentences.english: So Puff that mighty dragon sadly slipped into his cave.
sentences.chinese: 神龙帕夫悲伤地游回龙洞。

sentences.english: It takes thousands of years to form a stalactite cave.
sentences.chinese: 龙洞的形成，要经历上千年的时间。

sentences.english: I like the Shuanglong Hole because it is very cool in summer.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢双龙洞，因为在夏天的时候很凉爽。

sentences.english: The Longdong Nunnery hidden in pines and cypresses, backs on to the mountain and faces south.
sentences.chinese: 龙洞庵背依高山，坐北面南，掩映于苍松翠柏之中。

sentences.english: The Huanglong Cave Scenic Spots in Zhangjiajie, the main performance site of the Country Music Week.
sentences.chinese: 张家界黄龙洞景区，音乐节开幕式主会场，风景秀丽。

sentences.english: Dragon Cave is a free adoptables site.
sentences.chinese: 龙洞是一个可免费领养龙蛋的网站。

definition: Longtan district of Jilin city 吉林市, Jilin province/see also 龍潭|龙潭[long2 tan2]/Longtan or Lungtan township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
dragon pool/dragon pond/see also 龍潭|龙潭[Long2 tan2]
Shilong district of Pingdingshan city 平頂山市|平顶山市[Ping2 ding3 shan1 shi4], Henan
Mt Danxia in Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong
Stone Forest, notable set of limestone formations in Yunnan
Dragon mountain/Longshan district of Liaoyuan city 遼源市|辽源市, Jilin/Longshan county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
Yangshan county in Qingyuan 清远, Guangdong
Xintang, common town or village name/Xintang village in Guangdong province
